## R features {#r-features}

::: noincremental
-   Statistical Software
    -   Stata, SAS, SPSS, Excel$^{*}$
-   Best Plotting Interface
    -   Tableau
-   Has analytical and computational capabilities beyond regular relational DBMS
    -   Relational: SQL (e.g., PostgreSQL)
    -   Non-relational: NoSQL (e.g., Apache)
-   Free
:::
